痟字的基本解释

痟
xiāo
头痛；酸痛：“春时有痟首疾。”
痟渴，中医指糖尿病、水崩症等：“痟似乌常渴。”
衰微。

痟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiāo］
［《廣韻》相邀切，平宵，心。］
(1)酸痛；头痛。亦泛指疼痛。
(2)病名。消渴，即糖尿病。

痟字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　痟； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页774第04
【唐韻】相邀切【集韻】【韻會】思邀切【正韻】先雕切，?音宵。【說文】酸痟，頭痛。【周禮·天官·疾醫】春時有痟首疾。【註】痟，酸，削也。首頭痛也。【疏】頭痛之外，別有酸削之痛也。酸，嘶也。【管子·地員篇】五沃之土，其澤多魚，其泉白靑，其人終無痟醒。【左思·蜀都賦】芳追氣邪，味蠲癘痟。【註】痟，頭病也。　又【玉篇】痟，渴病也。漢司馬相如痟渴疾。○按《漢書》本傳作消渴。　又通作消。【後漢·李通傳】素有消疾。【註】消中之疾。

痟字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
痟字的起名意思

暂无。

痟
Basic explanation of words
痟
xiāo
Headache; soreness: "I have the first disease in spring."
Thirst, Chinese medicine refers to diabetes, water insipidus, etc.: "Thirsty is like black."
Decline.
痟
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [xiāo]
["Guangyun" invites each other, calm night, heart. ]
(1) Soreness; headache. Also refers to pain in general.
(2) The name of the disease. Diabetes, namely diabetes.
痟

[Tang Yun] Inviting and cutting [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] Inviting and cutting [Zheng Yun] Carve and cut first,? Sound night. [Said the text] Suffering, headache. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Illness Doctor】The first illness of the disease occurs in spring. [Note] 痟, sour, cut too. First headache also. 【Sparse】Besides headache, don't have soreness. Sour, sizzle too. [Guanzi·Diyuan Chapter] The land of five fertile soils has many fishes and springs, and its people will not wake up after all. [Zuo Si·Shu Du Fu] Fang chases the qi and evil, and the taste is stubborn. [Note] Sickness, head disease also.　[Jade Chapter] You are thirsty and sick. Han Sima Xiang is thirsty and sick. ○According to the "Hanshu" biography for quenching one's thirst.　It was cancelled again. [Later Han·Li Tong Chuan] It is known to alleviate diseases.
